dc_description_s: Alternate titles of Detroit map: Rand, McNally & Co's map of the main portion of Detroit; Rand, McNally & Co.'s new 11 x 14 map of the main portion of Detroit. Alternate title of Michigan map: Rand, McNally & Co.'s new 11 x 14 map of Michigan. Title at head of maps: Atlas of the world. Includes indexes. Gives population figures for 1890 and 1895. Insets: Outline map of Detroit -- Northern portion of Michigan [scale ca. 1:2,788,000] with inset of Isle Royale. "41." "42." 2 maps on 1 sheet: both sides, col.; 23 x 31 cm, and 31 x 29 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
